import { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Container, Image, Nav, Navbar, Offcanvas } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { publicUrl } from '../index'; import '../styles/off-canvas-drawer.css'; export default function NavigationBar() { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(true); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); return ( <>
Cyberbrain
Tasks Areas Resources Archives
{isLoggedIn ? ( Logout ) : ( <> Login Sign Up )}
); }
